gt_metadata.note: Freeform Stacking: Leah reviews entire document including CP redlines. Representing party is SAME as Freeform Baseline.

part_a_cp_redlines.original_text: Agency shall provide the creative and digital marketing services described in each Statement of Work executed by the Parties pursuant to this Agreement.
part_a_cp_redlines.cp_redline: Agency shall provide services described in each Statement of Work and any related services reasonably requested by Client without requiring additional approval.
part_a_cp_redlines.example_revision: Revert to baseline: Services limited to those in executed SOWs. Reject any 'related services' or Client-unilateral scope expansion without defined fee mechanism.
key_elements: 1) Specific SOW scope only 2) No open-ended 'related services' 3) Agency bills for work outside SOW without approval = risk
acceptable_variations: May add: expedited change order process
May add: small change threshold (under $X or Y hours) requiring documented approval
unacceptable_responses: No fee mechanism for additional work
part_a_cp_redlines.reasoning_must_address: Scope creep; undefined obligation; Agency could be required to provide unbilled services

part_a_cp_redlines.original_text: To the extent Agency IP is incorporated into any Deliverables, Agency grants Client a non-exclusive, perpetual, royalty-free license to use such Agency IP solely as part of the Deliverables.
part_a_cp_redlines.cp_redline: To the extent Agency IP is incorporated into Deliverables, Agency grants Client a license to use such Agency IP in [Territory], revocable upon notice.
part_a_cp_redlines.example_revision: Revert to baseline: Non-exclusive, perpetual, royalty-free license. Reject territory limitation and revocability.
key_elements: 1) Perpetual, not revocable 2) Worldwide, not territory-limited 3) Royalty-free 4) For use as part of Deliverables
acceptable_variations: May add: modification rights for Client
May add: sublicense rights to affiliates
part_a_cp_redlines.reasoning_must_address: Client cannot use deliverables effectively with territory limitation or revocability; baseline already protects Agency IP ownership

part_a_cp_redlines.original_text: Client shall review each Deliverable and provide written acceptance or rejection within fifteen (15) business days. If rejected, Agency has opportunity to cure.
part_a_cp_redlines.cp_redline: Client shall review each Deliverable and provide written acceptance or rejection within five (5) business days. If Client fails to respond, Deliverable is deemed accepted.
part_a_cp_redlines.example_revision: Revert to baseline: 15 business days for review. Reject 5-day acceptance default.
key_elements: 1) Minimum 15 business days review period 2) Silence = rejection, not acceptance (baseline provision) 3) Agency has cure opportunity
acceptable_variations: May add: reminder process before deemed acceptance
part_a_cp_redlines.reasoning_must_address: 5 days insufficient for stakeholder review; silence=acceptance creates risk of accepting defective deliverables

part_a_cp_redlines.original_text: AGENCY'S TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE FEES PAID BY CLIENT UNDER THE APPLICABLE STATEMENT OF WORK.
part_a_cp_redlines.cp_redline: Agency's total liability shall not exceed the lesser of SOW fees or $25,000.
part_a_cp_redlines.example_revision: Revert to baseline: Liability cap tied to SOW fees without arbitrary fixed ceiling.
key_elements: 1) Cap tied to fees paid 2) No arbitrary low fixed cap 3) Scales with engagement size 4) Minimum floor acceptable
acceptable_variations: Cap at SOW fees (no fixed ceiling)
May add: carve-outs for gross negligence, willful misconduct
unacceptable_responses: Cap that does not scale with engagement
Arbitrary low ceiling disconnected from fees
part_a_cp_redlines.reasoning_must_address: $25K fixed cap inadequate for substantial engagements; cap should be proportional to fees paid

part_b_whole_document.note: Part B uses the Freeform Baseline GT. Same contract, same issues. Evaluate whether Leah still detects these risks when CP redlines are present.

part_c_document_quality.scope: Every redline Leah produces in the output .docx

per_redline_capture.linked_gt_id: GT ID if NEW_REDLINE addresses Part B issue, else null
per_redline_capture.action_executed: ACCEPT | MODIFY | REJECT | ADD | DELETE | NONE
per_redline_capture.insertion_accuracy: 0-2 | NA (aligned pair average, NA for DELETE/simple swaps)

aggregation_rules.quality_fields: Averaged across evaluations; median used for divergent scores
